result.execSummary:
All charges against Robert Blair Springfield in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Robert Blair Springfield is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert Blair Springfield

records.addlTxt: Defendant Robert Blair Springfield in court.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Robert Blair Springfield.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for a Jury Trial.  State's witness is not available and the State is unable to proceed. Defense moves to dismiss the case. Court ordered case dismissed.

Defendant Robert Blair Springfield in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Jury Call first call.  State and defense are in jury trial posture.  Case is passed. 

CASE IS RECALLED LATER THE SAME MORNING:
Court is in jury trial with another jury trial.  Case is adjourned to 10-19-22 at 8:30 am for jury trial.  Jury trial scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Robert Blair Springfield in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Matter scheduled for Jury Trial.  Parties are ready to proceed.  Case passed to address rest of court's calendar.  

Second call at 10:20 am.  Court will be in trial on another case and unable to hear this case.  Additionally, there are no spin courts are available.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Jury trial scheduled for August 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Robert Blair Springfield in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
State's motion for joinder granted.   Final pretrial proceeded.  State's offer stated on the record.  Defense rejects State's offer.  Case remains in jury trial posture.  Case is adjourned to 6-6-22 at 8:30 am for Jury Trial.

Defendant Robert Blair Springfield in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Robert Blair Springfield appeared by video means with Attorney.
Case in Court for Status Conference.   Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Court grants defense request.  Case adjourned to Branch 10.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Robert Blair Springfield in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes as a friend of the Court..  Mark O Thomson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel has not been appointed on this case, but does represent defendant on another case.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Status conference scheduled for March 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with JS and CT
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Robert Blair Springfield in court.  Michael Jerome Lonski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 10 for a Pretrial Conference.  Status conference scheduled for March 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 2/25/22 @ 2p
